seo.title: Warren Dalawampu - Software Engineer Portfolio
seo.description: Senior Backend Developer specializing in PHP, Laravel, Node.js, React, and modern web technologies. Expert in building scalable microservices and RESTful APIs.
seo.keywords: software engineer, backend developer, php developer, laravel developer, nodejs developer, react developer, full stack developer, microservices, REST API

personal.name: Warren Dalawampu
personal.title: Software Engineer
personal.tagline: Building scalable solutions with modern technologies

about.heading: Senior Backend Developer & System Architect
paragraphs: Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience specializing in backend development, microservices architecture, and system integration. Currently working as a Senior Backend Developer at NTT Limited Philippines, where I collaborate with other teams to build scalable solutions.

Expert in PHP/Laravel, Node.js, and React, with extensive experience in Docker, MongoDB, MySQL, and modern DevOps practices. Strong background in building RESTful APIs, implementing payment gateways, and integrating third-party services.

experience.description: Leading system architecture design and guiding junior developers in building scalable solutions.
highlights: Collaborate with fellow seniors to create system architecture plans
Implement hybrid login system for online casino with QR code access
Integrate 3rd party payment gateways (Xendit, Unionbank)
Use self-hosted GitLab for project management and version control
Develop in containerized environment using VSCode with dev container setup

experience.description: Worked with international teams on highly configurable systems.
highlights: Use MongoDB pipeline and Excel-like functions for system configuration
Analyze business requirements and implement as configuration
Document and test configurations using Jira and Confluence
Collaborate with different nationalities in global projects

experience.description: Built RESTful APIs, microservices, and integrated third-party casino games.
highlights: Implement RESTful APIs and streaming server using Laravel and Node.js
Use Test Driven Development approach
Integrate 3rd party casino games and payment gateways
Build microservices and admin UI using DCAT Admin
Implement caching and protobuf for performance and security
Develop Telegram Bot as notification system

experience.description: Full-stack development and DevOps responsibilities including server management.
highlights: Develop frontend with React.js consuming RESTful APIs
Build Node.js applications with MongoDB
Setup and maintain Linux servers, Docker containers, and VMs
Implement CI/CD pipelines and deploy using GitHub webhooks
Deploy and manage services (Nextcloud, GitLab, Portainer, WireGuard VPN)
Guide interns and collaborate with network engineers

experience.description: IT support and development for university systems.
highlights: Develop enrollment system using MVC PHP framework
Setup computer laboratory and troubleshoot network issues
Provide technical support to employees and students

education.degree: Master of Science in Information Technology
Bachelor of Science in Information and Technology

projects.title: Online Casino Platform
projects.description: Hybrid login system with QR code access for venue machines, integrated with payment gateways and third-party game providers.

projects.title: Streaming Server
projects.description: Real-time streaming server built with Laravel and Node.js for live content delivery.

projects.title: Microservices Architecture
projects.description: Built multiple microservices with admin UI for controlling behavior and data using DCAT Admin.

projects.title: HRIS & Time Logging System
projects.description: Modified HRIS system with barcode scanner integration for employee time logging and kiosk setup.

projects.title: Telegram Bot System
projects.description: Notification system and deployment management using Telegram bots and webapp integration.

projects.title: DevOps Infrastructure
projects.description: Self-hosted GitLab, Portainer, Nextcloud, and various services with CI/CD pipelines and monitoring.
